metadata.title: Join Our Discord Community - Mondkalender
metadata.description: Connect with thousands of players, share strategies, get help, and stay updated with the latest news and events!

hero.title: Join Our Discord Community
hero.description: Connect with thousands of Mondkalender players, share strategies, get help, and stay updated with the latest news and events!

main.title: Official Main Server
main.description: The main community hub with 15,000+ members. General chat, guides, and official announcements.

scripts.title: Scripts & Cheats Hub
scripts.description: Dedicated server for script sharing, executor help, and cheat discussions. Updated daily.

trading.title: Trading Community
trading.description: Buy, sell, and trade in-game items. Secure middleman services and price guides available.

competitive.title: Competitive Players
competitive.description: For serious players. Tournaments, leaderboards, and advanced strategies. Skill-based matchmaking.

roleplay.title: Roleplay Community
roleplay.description: Immersive roleplay experiences. Create characters, join factions, and live in the forest world.

international.title: International Hub
international.description: Multi-language support. Connect with players worldwide. Channels in Spanish, French, German, and more.

comparison.title: Server Comparison Guide
comparison.description: Not sure which server to join? Here's a quick comparison to help you choose the perfect community for your needs.
comparison.caption: Compare servers to find the best fit for you

recommendations.title: Quick Join Recommendations
recommendations.description: New to the community? Here are our top picks based on what you're looking for:

newPlayers.title: New Players
newPlayers.description: Start with the Official Main Server for guides and friendly help

scriptUsers.title: Script Users
scriptUsers.description: Get the latest scripts and executor help

international.title: International
international.description: Connect with players in your language

features.title: Why Join Our Discord Community?
features.description: Discover all the amazing features and benefits of being part of our active Discord community.

realTimeChat.title: Real-Time Chat
realTimeChat.description: Connect with players instantly, share strategies, and get help when you need it most.

verifiedScripts.title: Verified Scripts
verifiedScripts.description: Access tested and verified scripts shared by trusted community members.

instantUpdates.title: Instant Updates
instantUpdates.description: Be the first to know about game updates, new scripts, and community events.

tradingHub.title: Trading Hub
tradingHub.description: Safe and secure trading with middleman services and price verification.

expertTips.title: Expert Tips
expertTips.description: Learn advanced strategies from experienced players and community experts.

events.title: Events & Contests
events.description: Participate in community events, tournaments, and win exclusive rewards.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.description: Please follow these simple rules to keep our community friendly and welcoming for everyone.
